_header: When Christ was born in Bedlam
_description: A song for Epiphany — eight 9-line stanzas

CamStJohn259.First Lines:
Qwan crist was borne in bedlemþer rose a sterre os
                    bryth…
CamStJohn259.Last Lines:
…þere in blys wellto schend us ferm þe pyth of
                    helle
CamStJohn259.Note:
False start to this on f. 3v, giving first four words after
                    end of 1900
CamStJohn259.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  G. C. Macaulay, eds.  
             “Fifteenth Century Carols and Other Pieces.” 
             Modern Language Review
         8 (1913): 68-87: 74-5.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 127-30.
